content:
Check:
  any:
    - all:
        - name: PCDTC
          operator: non_empty
        - name: USUBJID
          operator: non_empty
        - name: PCTESTCD
          operator: is_not_unique_set
          value:
            - USUBJID
            - PCSPEC
            - PCDTC
    - all:
        - name: PCDTC
          operator: non_empty
        - name: POOLID
          operator: non_empty
        - name: PCTESTCD
          operator: is_not_unique_set
          value:
            - POOLID
            - PCSPEC
            - PCDTC
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.192
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when there is more than one record present for any particular
  Pharmacokinetics Concentration, in the PC Domain, for a subject or pool on a particular
  date.
Outcome:
  Message: The Pharmacokinetics Concentration test is not unique for this subject
    or pool and specimen and date/time.
  Output Variables:
    - USUBJID
    - POOLID
    - PCTESTCD
    - PCSPEC
    - PCDTC
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '192'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: One record per test per specimen per observation time
                  per subject or pool
                Document: SENDIG v3.1
                Section: 6.3.11
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - PC

json.Description: Raise an error when there is more than one record present for any particular Pharmacokinetics Concentration, in the PC Domain, for a subject or pool on a particular date.

Outcome.Message: The Pharmacokinetics Concentration test is not unique for this subject or pool and specimen and date/time.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: One record per test per specimen per observation time per subject or pool
